definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
(used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of

Zhuge Liang (181-234), military leader and prime minister of Shu Han 蜀漢|蜀汉 during the Three Kingdoms period/the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius/mastermind
to apply to/to put into (practice etc)/to put to (a test, a vote etc)
to appeal (to reason, sentiment, charity etc)/to resort to (a course of action)
to put into practice/to carry out (idiom)

feudal vassal/feudal princes, esp. the monarchs (dukes or princes) of the several vassal states 諸侯國|诸侯国 of Zhou during Western Zhou and Spring and Autumn periods 11th-5th century BC/subordinate warlord/local official
things like this (idiom); and so on/and the rest/etc
Zhuji county level city in Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴[Shao4 xing1], Zhejiang
Zhuji county level city in Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴[Shao4 xing1], Zhejiang
Zhucheng county level city in Weifang 濰坊|潍坊[Wei2 fang1], Shandong

sentences.english: Conclusion The characteristics of P300 of patients with AD deserve further studies.
sentences.chinese: 結論AD患者P300變化諸特點值得進一步隨訪。

sentences.english: Their number incalculable; Thus also is the assembly of Bodhisattvas.
sentences.chinese: 非是算數之所能知，諸菩薩衆，亦復如是。

sentences.english: You are following the Action Principles.
sentences.chinese: 你正遵循諸行動原則而行事。

sentences.english: These resulted from the gradual intensification of imperial power starting from the middle period of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 諸如此者，皆與皇權自劉宋中葉以降漸趨強化有關。

sentences.english: Because he can accomplish such good roots.
Jesus, to Thee be all glory given;
sentences.chinese: 天人諸榮耀完全歸主一身。

sentences.english: However, Bhikkhus, this is just a simile.
sentences.chinese: 然而諸比丘，這只是一個比喻。

sentences.english: Since it was born, Rome faced to the threaten by its neighbor Achaean .
sentences.chinese: 自羅馬誕生以來，它就面臨着鄰居希臘諸城邦的威脅。

sentences.english: But there are other heavenly bodies which are still in this stage of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 今太空諸天體多尚在此期進化之中。

sentences.english: I've just finished reading a book on the ancient kingdoms of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 我剛讀完一本關於墨西哥古代諸王國的書。

sentences.english: The assembly of Bodhisattvas is also likewise.
Secondly, I wish to congratulate Mr Chu on his double achievements.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我要祝賀諸先生的“雙重成就”。

sentences.english: The palaces of those Bodhisattvas are also decorated in the same way.
sentences.chinese: 諸菩薩衆，所居宮殿，亦復如是。

sentences.english: There he outshines the other devas both in beauty &in glory.
sentences.chinese: 他在彼處的美麗與榮耀勝於諸天神。

sentences.english: Zhugongdiao is a large sing literature.
sentences.chinese: 諸官調是一種大型講唱文學。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
